Contact Me
Passionate about crafting delightful and functional experiences and focused on writing clean and efficient code.

Full-stack professional

I work with React-powered frontend and Firebase-powered backend stack to create delightful, functional and performant Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) for wide range of browsers and devices.

Award-winning developer

One of the creators of Homebound - a web app that is a grand prize winner of DEV x Twilio Hackathon 2020. This delightful app won a grand prize even with a serious worldwide competition.

Distinguished Author

My articles on DEV received more than 170,000 views and I was recognized as an distinguished DEV author in 2019. I'm also a guest writer for Smashing Magazine, CSS-Tricks and LogRocket.

Magento-certified Developer

I've been working on development and maintenance of multiple Magento and Magento 2 projects ranging from small-scale websites to multi-store enterprise websites.
